backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, sales, expenses, and goals with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, navigation, and offline sync setup.
frontend/src/components/IconTile.tsx: Clickable icon tile used for selecting activity types or categories.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryActionBut: Configurable large action button with variants and sizes.
frontend/src/components/ProfitStatusChip: Displays today’s profit with colored styling and trend icons.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Thin progress bar component with clamped percentage value.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusChip.t: Shows online/offline status and number of pending offline actions.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Header bar with optional back and logout buttons plus title.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor, exposing loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for sales, expenses, stats, and mutations with offline fallback and optimistic data handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration and CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/offline/offlineQueue.ts: Implements IndexedDB-backed offline action queueing and optimistic data storage.
frontend/src/offline/useConnectivityStat: Tracks online/offline browser status with event listeners.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineSync.ts: Syncs queued offline actions when reconnected and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/screens/AddExpenseScreen.ts: Form screen for creating an expense with amount and category selection, calling useCreateExpense and navigating back on success.
frontend/src/screens/AddSaleScreen.tsx: Form screen to record a sale with amount and optional product, using useCreateSale and returning to the dashboard on success.
Displays today’s sales, expenses, and profit using fetched data and lists individual entries for the current day.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard showing user greeting, available cash, today's profit, and navigation buttons for sales, expenses, and summaries.
frontend/src/screens/MonthlyGoalScreen.t: Allows setting a monthly savings goal, shows progress toward it, and updates the goal via useSetMonthlyGoal.
Initial profile creation screen collecting first name and activity type, saving via useSaveProfile before entering the app.
frontend/src/screens/WelcomeScreen.tsx: React welcome screen with hero image, text, and a start button that triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/calculations.ts: Utility functions computing available cash, daily profit, and goal progress from sales and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date helpers to detect today, get current month/year, and check if a timestamp falls in a given month.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Functions to format numbers as GNF currency and parse GNF-formatted input into numeric values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, goals, architecture, features, and required assets for the finance app.
